Published January 4 2015

Making good software is hard

Making good software is hard — Panic Inc. makes some of my go-to apps, including Transmit and Prompt. They’ve written up the annual Panic Report, and they’ve written a tad more about their business than usual. It’s a good piece, if you’ve ever wondered what a successful software shop goes through in a year.

Enjoy your day.
